scripts.compile:dev: npm run compile && chokidar "src/**/*.java" -c "javac --source-path src {path} -d out"
scripts.pack:client: rm -rf dist/*_client.jar && mkdir -p dist && jar cvfe dist/$(cat package.json | jq -r .jar)_client.jar client.Main -C ./out shared -C ./out client
scripts.pack:server: rm -rf dist/*_server.jar && mkdir -p dist && jar cvfe dist/$(cat package.json | jq -r .jar)_server.jar server.Main -C ./out shared -C ./out server
